title: Dynamic One Photon Localization in a Discrete Model of Quantum Optics
authors: Joseph Kraisler, Jeffrey Schenker, John C. Schotland
abstract:
We consider a recently proposed model for the propagation of one-photon
states in a random medium of two-level atoms. We demonstrate the existence of
Anderson localization of single photon states in an energy band centered at the
resonant energy of the atoms. Additionally, for a Bosonic model of the atoms
the results can be extended to multiple photon states.
